video.title: Disney Animation Collection: Vol. 2: Three Little Pigs
video.synopsis: The Three Little Pigs refuse to be scared by a hungry wolf -- and get a crash course in construction -- in this classic anthology.

episodes.synopsis: Seven tales include: Three Little Pigs, Three Blind Mouseketeers, Chicken Little, Big Bad Wolf, Lambert the Sheepish Lion and Three Little Wolves.
episodes.title: Play All Seven: Vol. 2

episodes.synopsis: While two happy-go-lucky pigs build flimsy houses of straw and sticks, the third pig toils at building a secure brick dwelling.
episodes.title: Three Little Pigs

episodes.synopsis: Red Riding Hood is warned by the Three Little Pigs about the wolf, who's waiting for her at Grandmother's house.
episodes.title: The Big Bad Wolf

episodes.synopsis: When the two pigs blow the practical pig's horn one too many times, they're captured by the Three Little Wolves.
episodes.title: Three Little Wolves

episodes.synopsis: A stork accidentally delivers a lion cub to a flock of sheep by mistake, which proves fortuitous when he grows up to protect them.
episodes.title: Lambert the Sheepish Lion

episodes.synopsis: Foxey Loxey cons the farmyard chicken and dim-witted Childen Little into believing his cave is the only safe place when the sky is falling.
episodes.title: Chicken Little

episodes.synopsis: As Captain Katt pursues the three mice, the mice get mixed up in a collection of bottles that serve to visually increase their number, confusing Katt.
episodes.title: Three Blind Mouseketeers

episodes.synopsis: The monkeys taunt little Elmer Elephant because of his long trunk. But when Tillie Tiger's house catches on fire, he uses his trunk to rescue her.
episodes.title: Elmer Elephant
